nodes.text: Decadence nightclub was a nightclub aboard the luxury repulsortrain Gem of Alderaan.

The club was dark inside, with the only light coming from some strobe lights and some dim table lamps. The lower level of the club had a bar, several booths, a dance floor, a main stage and two smaller dance stages that included a floor-to-ceiling bronzium pole. On the upper level of the club, there were some small tables and booths, another bar, a sabacc table and a small manager's suit.

When the Gem of Alderaan was launch, Alya Aldrete had bouncers posted at the entrances to the club. After the train was attacked by Trandoshan mercenaries, some of them attacked the club and fought some Alderaanian Resistance fighters there.
